column5: I read in the Canada fishing regulations the opener was on May 15 this year. It also says this is the third Sat. Can anyone tell me is it always on the third Sat. in May? Trying to make plans for next year and didn't know if this being a leap year could have any berring the opener.
[font color=green size=3][b]It's the third Saturday, I beleive the opener is almost a week later by the calander next year.
Thanks for the quick response. I figured it was when they also noted the third Sat. of May. Just didn't know if this year was different due to being a leap year. Thanks again TrailerGuy
